item.description:
Body Mind Systems, a comprehensive martial arts system with a school in Stoneham, Massachusetts, in cooperation with Human Harmonies Health Centers, invites the public to a free lecture on Thursday March 10, 2011 7:30 PM – 8:30 PM, titled, “If You Want Your Life To Change, You Have To Change Things In Your Life.”  This lecture is presented by Tim Bielby, LMT, CST, a 7th Degree Black Belt with Body Mind Systems and National Director of Human Harmonies Health Centers.  He has over 25 years of experience teaching, training and working with people of all ages and abilities to achieve their health and wellness goals.  He specializes in Natural Qigong Therapy, Cranio-Sacral Therapy, and Movement Therapy that incorporates his martial arts background.  The lecture will be held at Body Mind Systems, 263 Main Street, Stoneham, Massachusetts. Reservations are recommended.  Call 781-279-1400 or email bob.lee@bodymindsystems.com to reserve a space.

 

 

 

The lecture will explore what aspects of modern society negatively affect our physical, mental, emotional and spiritual health, such as information overload, daily technological advances, and busy schedules that do not let us rest, and find ways of approaching our life with positive energy, creating a life of joy, abundance and health.

 

 

 

“We are very fortunate to have Tim Bielby speak at our school and open the lecture up to the public,” says Bob Lee, a 3rd Degree Black Belt and an Assistant Head Instructor at the Stoneham school.  “He normally teaches privately to our students who are at least 1st Degree Black Belts or instructors.  It’s a rare opportunity for people to access this level of information.  I highly recommend to anyone who has been asking themselves what more could they be doing to have more in their life.”
item.how_to_find_us: Body Mind Systems - Human Harmonies Health Centers Lecture “If You Want Your Life To Change, You Have To Change Things In Your Life.”
